body.name: Noctua NF-A12x25 PWM chromax.Black.swap, Premium Quiet Fan, 4-Pin (120mm, Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 2 hrs 4 mins
features: Premium quiet fan, 120x120x25mm, 12V, 4-pin PWM, max. 2000 RPM, max. 22.6 dB(A), >150,000 h MTTF
Next-gen A-series design combines high airflow and high static pressure performance, ideal both as a case fan and for CPU coolers, watercooling radiators and AIO liquid cooling systems
State-of-the-art engineering (AAO frame, Flow Acceleration Channels, record tight 0.5mm tip clearance) and construction (Sterrox LCP material, metal-reinforced hub, metal bearing shell, etc.)
4-pin PWM version for automatic speed control via 4-pin PWM motherboard fan headers, 450-2000rpm speed range (near silent at idle, powerful under load)
chromax.black.swap edition with swappable red, black, white, blue, yellow, grey and green anti-vibration pads for colour-customising (4 pads of each colour plus black anti-vibration gasket)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Having received more than 100 awards and recommendations from international hardware websites and magazines, Noctua’s flagship model NF-A12x25 has established itself as a true deluxe choice when it comes to premium-quality quiet 120mm fans. Various state-of-the-art technologies and a record tight tip clearance of only 0.5mm, which is made possible by using the novel Sterrox liquid-crystal polymer material, allow it to achieve superb results in all types of usage: Whether it’s in low-impedance, airflow-oriented applications such as case cooling, or high-impedance, pressure-demanding scenarios such as on heatsinks and watercooling radiators, the NF-A12x25 is a proven winner. The chromax.black.swap edition combines the NF-A12x25’s signature quiet cooling performance with an attractive black design and a bundle of swappable red, white, blue, green, grey, yellow and black anti-vibration pads that allow the colour-customisation of the fan to match individual build colour schemes. For further customisation, a wide range of accessories such as coloured cables and anti-vibration mounts are available separately. Topped off with Noctua’s trusted premium-grade SSO2 bearing and more than 150,000 hours MTTF, the NF-A12x25 PWM chromax.black.swap is the perfect choice for all users who value individual, focused build aesthetics just as much as class-leading quality and performance.

Next-generation performance Noctua’s 120mm fans such as the NF-F12 and NF-S12A are renowned as being among the best on the market and have received more than 400 awards and recommendations from the international press. With its further improved efficiency and novel, state-of-the-art engineering, the NF-A12x25 represents another step up in performance and manufacturing.

chromax.black.swap edition Maximising colour choices, Noctua’s chromax.black.swap edition fans can be colour-customised using the included swappable anti-vibration pads as well as optional anti-vibration mounts and cables. This makes them ideal for enthusiasts looking for true premium-grade fans that can be colour-coordinated with popular build themes such as all black, black & white or black & red. Sterrox liquid-crystal polymer compound The NF-A12x25’s impeller is made from Noctua’s novel Sterrox liquid-crystal polymer (LCP) compound that features extreme tensile strength, an exceptionally low thermal expansion coefficient and damping characteristics that are ideal for reducing resonance and vibration phenomena in advanced fan-blade designs. Ultra-tight tip clearance The NF-A12x25 has a record tight tip clearance (distance between the blade tips and the inside of the frame) of only 0.5mm. This highly ambitious design sets a new benchmark for 120mm fans and helps the NF-A12x25 to work more efficiently against back pressure, such as on heatsinks or radiators, by reducing leak flows through the gap between impeller and frame. Swappable anti-vibration pads in 7 colours The NF-A12x25 PWM chromax.black.swap comes with 4 white, red, blue, green, grey, yellow and black NA-AVP1 anti-vibration pads. By combining the various colours with black or going all black using the supplied NA-AVG1 anti-vibration gasket, the fan can be coordinated with most popular build colour schemes out of the box. Additional NA-SAVP1 sets for outfitting both sides in one colour can be purchased separately.

Highly optimised P/Q curve for all applications The NF-A12x25’s sophisticated aerodynamic design allows for a pressure to airflow (P/Q) curve that is extremely strong in the critical mid-section. This means that the NF-A12x25 offers excellent performance in both static pressure demanding and airflow demanding applications.

NF-A12x25 PWM NF-A12x25 FLX NF-A12x25 ULN NF-A12x25 5V PWM NF-A12x25 5V NF-A12x25 PWM chromax.black.swap Voltage 12 V 12 V 12 V 5 V 5 V 12 V Connector 4-pin PWM 3-pin 3-pin 4-pin PWM 3-pin 4-pin PWM RPM Max: 2000 / Min: 450 2000 1200 Max: 1900 / Min: 450 1900 Max: 2000 / Min: 450 RPM with L.N.A. 1700 1700 900 - - - RPM with U.L.N.A. - 1350 - - - - Acoustical Noise 22,6 dB(A) 22,6 dB(A) 12,1 dB(A) 21,4 dB(A) 21,4 dB(A) 22,6 dB(A) Acoustical Noise with L.N.A. 18,8 dB(A) 18,8 dB(A) 7,6 dB(A) - - - Acoustical Noise with U.L.N.A. - 14,2 dB(A) - - - - Size 120x120x25 120x120x25 120x120x25 120x120x25 120x120x25 120x120x25 Colour Brown & Beige Brown & Beige Brown & Beige Brown & Beige Brown & Beige Black with swappable coloured anti-vibration pads

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome fans that money can buy.
reviews.reviewText: These fans are really good, they are extremely quiet, can pull alot of air at low speeds and they remain quiet even at 80% speed which is around 1850-1900 RPM if I remember correctly. Only two problems about this fan is they're a little pricey and the cable is a bit too short and that can be a problem when building in larger cases which is my second complaint because you have to spend more to get an extended cable for it but overall everything else about this product is incredible. I would definitely recommend someone these fans because they are what you would call high-performance fans and they are worth every penny just keep in mind of the its 30 dollar price tag and its short PMW cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and quiet
reviews.reviewText: These fans are great. Very quiet and my PC is very cool. No vibrations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best 120mms i've used
reviews.reviewText: Probably the single best 120mm fan i've used. Build quality is supreme, it looks absolutely fantastic, and the noise levels are near silent during use. While it is at a fairly high price premium, I would say it is absolutely worth it if you are willing to spend some extra money on your case fans. Thermals are top notch as well, they put almost every 120mm i've used to shame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Noctua NF-A12x25 - The Stealthy Powerhouse for Ultimate Cooling!
reviews.reviewText: The Noctua NF-A12x25 PWM chromax.Black.swap is a silent force that transformed my desktop experience. As someone who craves peak performance without the unnecessary hum of traditional fans, this premium quiet fan is a revelation. The 4-pin design allows for precise control over airflow, and the sleek chromax.Black.swap aesthetics add a touch of elegance to my rig. Its 120mm size ensures compatibility with various setups, making it a versatile choice for gamers, content creators, or anyone seeking top-notch cooling without the noise. No more compromising on silence for power – the Noctua NF-A12x25 strikes the perfect balance, enhancing my desktop's efficiency while keeping things blissfully quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, quiet, cool
reviews.reviewText: I stuck with Noctua fans for my Intel NUC, and it handles the tight compact case for a Canyon with an i9 and a 3060 in it, so I replaced more fans in a different PC with these as case fans.The case has an acrylic side panel, and otherwise doesn’t have amazing airflow. These fans? Even with a bit of crowded cables in their way, the noise and cooling is far superior to the older fans that had been in there for some 6+ years.They’re very versatile, and don’t sound any more loud than someone quietly talking, so streaming with these even running at a pretty decent speed, you’d never hear them on your mic.Even running demanding games, streaming, with RTX shader settings at high; these fans really haven’t kicked up to a point where I could hear them clearly from several feet away. I really don’t hear them; I head the GPU fans.That’s the common thing honestly running Noctua fans in your PC cases for airflow; you don’t hear them much or at all, you instead hear every other fan. You’ll hear your AIO fans on the radiator, or your GPU fans, but not the case fans. That’s probably the best problem to have, though, because they aren’t having to run to a point where they’re at full blast anyway. The PCs cool enough the temps are well below 70-80°C even with a heater running (it’s winter currently).TLDR; get these fans, so you don’t hear them. They work. Just get them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So worth it. So quiet and performs Super Well. This is seriously the best brand for fans, especially if you want to make a low profile/small form factor build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet as can be
reviews.reviewText: Very quiet - the best fans I've ever used! Definitely worth the extra money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Noctua NF-A12x25 PWM Chromax in Black. It replaced a larger Brown/Tan Noctua CPU heatsink fan that was a bit too big, for my liking. This particular fan is smaller and I appreciate the shorter power wire leading to the motherboard. My larger brown/tan Noctua had a seriously long cable, so I appreciate the shorter one. Overall, good fan. Quiet and work as advertised. Arrived on time.
produto de alta qualidade, silencioso, ótima refrigeração
No incluye la Y y el adaptador de bajo ruido de la linea cafe. Funciona bien con disipadores.

reviews.reviewTitle: Exceptional design and performance but too pricey...
reviews.reviewText: I have one of these fan as an exhaust in my build. It performs amazing where it is able push out out a lot of airflow and stay super quiet. In terms of design, they are all black which is fits the color scheme of most PC builds. My main issue with this fan is the price and extras. At 45$, it cost 8$ over the original one. It doesn't come with a short extension and a splitter as well. Instead, you get more anti vibration feets and one long extension cable.For pure airflow and low noise level, these are probably the best fans on the market in terms of performance and looks. If you want Chromax fans for a radiator or to pass air through a mesh filter, the NF-F12 is a better option in terms of price.Overall, this is the best of the best in terms of performance, but you still expect more in the box given the price premium.

reviews.reviewTitle: Kühlleistung der Extraklasse mit erstaunlicher Stille
reviews.reviewText: Titel: Noctua NF-A12x25 PWM chromax.black.swap - Kühlleistung der Extraklasse mit erstaunlicher Stille⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Der Noctua NF-A12x25 PWM chromax.black.swap Lüfter hat meine Erwartungen in Bezug auf Kühlleistung und Geräuschkulisse bei weitem übertroffen. Obwohl der Preis etwas höher ist als bei anderen Herstellern, rechtfertigt die beeindruckende Leistung des Lüfters diesen Aufpreis voll und ganz.Die Kühlleistung des NF-A12x25 PWM ist bemerkenswert. Selbst unter starker Belastung bleibt die Temperatur im Desktop-System auf einem erstaunlich niedrigen Niveau. Die Konstruktion des Lüfters, gepaart mit der hochwertigen Verarbeitung, ermöglicht eine effiziente Kühlung bei minimaler Geräuschentwicklung.Die Geräuschkulisse des Lüfters ist nahezu unhörbar. Selbst bei höheren Drehzahlen bleibt der Lüfter erstaunlich leise, was besonders während intensiver Gaming-Sessions oder rechenintensiver Aufgaben von Vorteil ist. Die PWM-Funktion ermöglicht eine präzise Anpassung der Lüftergeschwindigkeit an die Bedürfnisse des Systems.Die chromax.black.swap-Version des Lüfters verleiht meinem Desktop-System eine ästhetisch ansprechende Note. Die Möglichkeit, die mitgelieferten Anti-Vibrations-Pads und Farb-Akzente zu tauschen, ermöglicht eine individuelle Anpassung an den persönlichen Stil.Insgesamt kann ich den Noctua NF-A12x25 PWM chromax.black.swap Lüfter uneingeschränkt empfehlen. Die Kombination aus erstklassiger Kühlleistung, minimaler Geräuschkulisse und individueller Anpassungsmöglichkeit macht ihn zu einer lohnenswerten Investition für alle, die Wert auf Qualität und Performance legen.

The media could not be loaded. Ho comprato due ventole per sostituire una doppia ARCTIC BioniX F120-120 mm su un dissipatore basso profilo per CPU AMD 5800x che riscalda abbastanza. Il test che ho fatto usando un fonometro standard a 50 cm distanza delle ventole, con impostazione del BIOS sul standard per le ventole , usando la copia nocthua ho ottenuto almeno 12 db (38db) in meno rispetto alla copieta ventole Artic(49db). Tenendo conto che questo modello arriva al massimo 2000rpm, riuscendoci mantenere le stesse temperature ( 70°C in full CPU) ma con meno rumore. Ho comprato varie ventole e dissipatori Nochuta e non sono stato mai deluso. Chi vuoloe qualità e performance paga. Li consiglio assolutamente.
